message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I think it will be really valuable for you, even more so than that price indicates. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Can you consider that?
